snippet: The New York Knicks hadn't won all season when trailing after three quarters, and it appeared they were falling too far behind for that change....
lead_paragraph: The New York Knicks hadn't won all season when trailing after three quarters, and it appeared they were falling too far behind for that change.

headline.main: Anthony Scores 35, Knicks Rally Past Pacers to End Skid at 3
headline.print_headline: Anthony Scores 35, Knicks Rally Past Pacers to End Skid at 3
